title: Mountain Justice
description: Mountain Justice is a short story about friendship and justice, with just a touch of the paranormal. How far would you go to save your friendâ€™s life? They have been friends since childhood.. He lives in the mountains, and she lives in on a farm. Rob is a veterinarian, and Annie is an animal whisperer. When circumstances thrust Annie into a dangerous situation, Rob is inexplicably compelled to go to the site of the threat. Was his feeling of dread merely a coincidence, or was it a premonition? What if it happens more than once?
author: Karen  Black
